#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,k,m,found,i;
	string a;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		found=0;
		m=0;
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
		cin>>a;
		for(i=0;i<a.length();i++)
		{
			if(a[i]=='#')
			m++;
			else
			{
				//printf("m=%d\n",m);
				if(m>=k)
				{
					found=1;
					break;
				}
				m=0;
			}
		    if(i==n-1)
		    {
		    	//printf("m=%d\n",m);
		    	if(a[i]=='#')
		    	{
		    		if(m>=k)
		    		{
		    			found=1;
		    			break;
		    		}
		    	}
		    }
		}
		if(found)
		printf("NO\n");
		else
		printf("YES\n");
	}
}
